name: BEES vs BEARS
description:
"UnBEElievable" - GameInformer

"A Sight to BEEhold" - Rock Paper Shotgun

"What the heck am I  supposed to BEE doing?" - IGN

"This is BEARly even a game!" - Giant Bomb

The least anticipated game of the year is FINALLY HERE!

BUILD your hive! DEFEAT the bears! UNLEASH MASS BEESTRUCTION!!!

LAUGH at the controls! Get MAD at the developers! QUESTION what made you hole up in your mom's basement and download crappy software!!!

A Real Time Strategy Game like None you've Seen Beefore!
